  <hr> 
  <h2> Package javazoom.jl.player </h2> 
  <table border="1" width="100%" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" summary=""> 
   <tbody>
    <tr bgcolor="#CCCCFF" class="TableHeadingColor"> 
     <th align="left" colspan="2"><font size="+2"> <b>Interface Summary</b></font></th> 
    </tr> 
    <tr bgcolor="white" class="TableRowColor"> 
     <td width="15%"><b><a href="../../../javazoom/jl/player/AudioDevice.html" title="interface in javazoom.jl.player">AudioDevice</a></b></td> 
     <td>The <code>AudioDevice</code> interface provides an abstraction for a device capable of sounding audio samples.</td> 
    </tr> 
   </tbody>
  </table> &nbsp; 
  <p> </p>
  <table border="1" width="100%" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" summary=""> 
   <tbody>
    <tr bgcolor="#CCCCFF" class="TableHeadingColor"> 
     <th align="left" colspan="2"><font size="+2"> <b>Class Summary</b></font></th> 
    </tr> 
    <tr bgcolor="white" class="TableRowColor"> 
     <td width="15%"><b><a href="../../../javazoom/jl/player/AudioDeviceBase.html" title="class in javazoom.jl.player">AudioDeviceBase</a></b></td> 
     <td>The <code>AudioDeviceBase</code> class provides a simple thread-safe implementation of the <code>AudioDevice</code> interface.</td> 
    </tr> 
    <tr bgcolor="white" class="TableRowColor"> 
     <td width="15%"><b><a href="../../../javazoom/jl/player/AudioDeviceFactory.html" title="class in javazoom.jl.player">AudioDeviceFactory</a></b></td> 
     <td>An <code>AudioDeviceFactory</code> class is responsible for creating a specific <code>AudioDevice</code> implementation.</td> 
    </tr> 
    <tr bgcolor="white" class="TableRowColor"> 
     <td width="15%"><b><a href="../../../javazoom/jl/player/FactoryRegistry.html" title="class in javazoom.jl.player">FactoryRegistry</a></b></td> 
     <td>The <code>FactoryRegistry</code> class stores the factories for all the audio device implementations available in the system.</td> 
    </tr> 
    <tr bgcolor="white" class="TableRowColor"> 
     <td width="15%"><b><a href="../../../javazoom/jl/player/JavaSoundAudioDevice.html" title="class in javazoom.jl.player">JavaSoundAudioDevice</a></b></td> 
     <td>The <code>JavaSoundAudioDevice</code> implements an audio device by using the JavaSound API.</td> 
    </tr> 
    <tr bgcolor="white" class="TableRowColor"> 
     <td width="15%"><b><a href="../../../javazoom/jl/player/JavaSoundAudioDeviceFactory.html" title="class in javazoom.jl.player">JavaSoundAudioDeviceFactory</a></b></td> 
     <td>This class is responsible for creating instances of the JavaSoundAudioDevice.</td> 
    </tr> 
    <tr bgcolor="white" class="TableRowColor"> 
     <td width="15%"><b><a href="../../../javazoom/jl/player/jlp.html" title="class in javazoom.jl.player">jlp</a></b></td> 
     <td>The <code>jlp</code> class implements a simple command-line player for MPEG audio files.</td> 
    </tr> 
    <tr bgcolor="white" class="TableRowColor"> 
     <td width="15%"><b><a href="../../../javazoom/jl/player/NullAudioDevice.html" title="class in javazoom.jl.player">NullAudioDevice</a></b></td> 
     <td>The <code>NullAudioDevice</code> implements a silent, no-op audio device.</td> 
    </tr> 
    <tr bgcolor="white" class="TableRowColor"> 
     <td width="15%"><b><a href="../../../javazoom/jl/player/Player.html" title="class in javazoom.jl.player">Player</a></b></td> 
     <td>The <code>Player</code> class implements a simple player for playback of an MPEG audio stream.</td> 
    </tr> 
    <tr bgcolor="white" class="TableRowColor"> 
     <td width="15%"><b><a href="../../../javazoom/jl/player/PlayerApplet.html" title="class in javazoom.jl.player">PlayerApplet</a></b></td> 
     <td>A simple applet that plays an MPEG audio file.</td> 
    </tr> 
   </tbody>
  </table> &nbsp;
